id, product_id AS productId, s_name AS sName, s_price AS sPrice, s_start_time AS sStartTime, s_end_time AS sEndTime, s_max_buy_num AS sMaxBuyNum, user_id AS userId, shop_id AS shopId, create_time AS createTime, is_delete AS isDelete, is_use AS isUse
mapper.select:
select count(g.id) from t_mall_seckill g where g.is_delete = 0
and g.s_start_time > now() and g.s_end_time > now()
and g.s_start_time <= now() and now() < g.s_end_time
and g.s_start_time < now() and g.s_end_time <= now()
and
g.shop_id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select from t_mall_seckill g left join t_mall_store s on g.shop_id = s.id /*left join t_wx_shop ws on s.wx_shop_id = ws.id*/ left join t_mall_seckill_join j on g.id=j.seckill_id left join t_mall_product p on p.id= g.product_id where g.is_delete = 0
and g.s_start_time > now() and g.s_end_time > now()
and g.s_start_time <= now() and now() < g.s_end_time
and g.s_start_time < now() and g.s_end_time <= now()
and
g.shop_id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
group by g.id order by g.create_time desc limit #{firstNum},#{maxNum}

SELECT count(distinct(a.id)) from t_mall_product a WHERE a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0
AND a.shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND a.pro_name like '%${proName}%'
AND a.id in (select product_id from t_mall_product_group where group_id = #{groupId})

select b.id, b.product_id as productId, b.s_name as sName, b.s_price as sPrice, b.s_start_time as sStartTime, b.s_end_time as sEndTime, b.s_max_buy_num as sMaxBuyNum, b.shop_id as shopId, c.image_url as imageUrl,e.specifica_img_url as specImageUrl,p.is_specifica as isSpecifica,p.pro_name as proName ,if(p.is_specifica = 0 ,p.pro_price,d.inv_price) as proPrice from t_mall_seckill b left join t_mall_product p on b.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url from t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON b.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price,id FROM t_mall_product_inventory where is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON b.product_id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id where b.id = #{id}

SELECT from t_mall_seckill g left join t_mall_seckill_join j on j.seckill_id=g.id left join t_mall_store s on g.shop_id = s.id /*left join t_wx_shop ws on s.wx_shop_id = ws.id*/ WHERE g.is_delete = 0 and g.is_use =1 and g.id = #{id} group by g.id

select from t_mall_seckill g where g.is_delete = 0 and g.is_use = 1 and ((g.s_start_time <= now() and now() < g.s_end_time ) or (g.s_start_time > now() and g.s_end_time > now())) and g.product_id=#{productId} and g.shop_id=#{shopId} limit 1
